import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete events by query"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/events/query"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Deletes events that match the legacy query criteria. Use this endpoint only after you have confirmed the target set with the corresponding query endpoint.

**Workflow Example**
1. Preview candidates: [GET /api/v1.0/events/query](/docs/api/events/get-events-by-query-get) or [POST /api/v1.0/events/query](/docs/api/events/get-events-by-query-post).
2. Confirm the filter criteria.
3. Delete matches: [DELETE /api/v1.0/events/query](/docs/api/events/delete-events-by-query).

**Minimal Required Fields**: None. Uses the same query criteria supported by the legacy GET endpoint.

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Events deleted.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Standard response for event and event type delete operations. Returns success status and any validation errors.","properties":{"IsSuccess":{"type":"boolean"},"Errors":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Standard error payload returned by the API when a request fails.","properties":{"StatusCode":{"type":"integer","description":"HTTP status code associated with the failure","example":401},"Message":{"type":"string","description":"Human-readable description of the error","example":"Attempted to perform an unauthorized operation."}},"required":["StatusCode","Message"],"title":"ErrorResponse"}}},"title":"EventsDeleteResponse"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
